```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
merged <- tibble()

for (instance in list.files('unique_results')){
  name <- paste('MIPLIB instance:',
                strsplit(instance, "_", fixed = TRUE)[[1]][1])
  
  if (grepl('uniform', instance)){
    weight = 'Uniform\nWeights'
  }
  else {
    weight = 'MORSE'
  }
  
  data <- read.delim(paste0('unique_results/',
                            instance), 
                     sep = '\n',
                     header = FALSE)
  
  freq <- table(data)
  
  prob <- freq/sum(freq)
  
  entropy <- -sum(prob * log2(prob))
  
  merged <- rbind(merged,
                  tibble(shannon = entropy,
                         Weights = weight,
                         instance = name))
  
}
```

```{r}
order_by_max <- merged %>%
  group_by(instance) %>%
  summarize(max_shannon = max(shannon)) %>%
  arrange(desc(max_shannon)) %>%
  pull(instance)
```


```{r}
merged %>%
  mutate(label = ifelse(shannon == 0,
                        NA,
                        round(shannon,
                              3))) %>%
  ggplot(aes(Weights,
             shannon,
             fill = Weights,
             label = label)) +
  geom_bar(stat = 'identity',
           color = 'black') +
  geom_text(position = 'dodge',
            fontface = 'bold',
            size = 7,
            vjust = 1.15,
            na.rm = TRUE) +
  scale_fill_brewer(palette = 'Set1') +
  facet_wrap(~factor(instance, order_by_max),
             scales = 'free_y',
             ncol = 4) +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(x = 'Optimization Method',
       y = 'Shannon Entropy',
       title = 'Shannon Entropy vs. Optimization Method',
       fill = 'Optimization Method') +
  theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5,
                                  size = 24),
        axis.title = element_text(size = 18),
        axis.text = element_text(size = 14),
        strip.background = element_rect(fill = 'grey90'),
        strip.text = element_text(face = 'bold'),
        legend.direction = 'horizontal',
        legend.position = 'top',
        legend.text = element_text(size = 14),
        legend.title = element_text(size = 14))

ggsave('plots/shannon.png', width = 12, height = 16, units = 'in', bg = 'white')
```

```{r}
entropy <- function(x){
  freq <- table(x)
  
  prob <- freq/sum(freq)
  
  return (-sum(prob * log2(prob)))
                   
}

merged_new <- tibble()

for (instance in list.files('unique_results')){
  name <- paste('MIPLIB instance:',
                strsplit(instance, "_", fixed = TRUE)[[1]][1])
  
  if (grepl('uniform', instance)){
    weight = 'Uniform\nWeights'
  }
  else {
    weight = 'MORSE'
  }
  
  data <- read.delim(paste0('unique_results/',
                            instance), 
                     sep = ',',
                     header = FALSE,
                     colClasses = 'character')
  
  merged_new <- rbind(merged_new,
                      tibble(instance = name,
                             Weights = weight,
                             shannon = mean(apply(data, 2, entropy))))
}
```

```{r}
order_by_max_new <- merged_new %>%
  group_by(instance) %>%
  summarize(max_shannon = max(shannon)) %>%
  arrange(desc(max_shannon)) %>%
  pull(instance)
```

```{r}
merged_new %>% 
  mutate(label = ifelse(shannon == 0,
                        NA,
                        round(shannon,
                              3))) %>%
  ggplot(aes(Weights,
             shannon,
             fill = Weights,
             label = label)) +
  geom_bar(stat = 'identity',
           color = 'black') +
  geom_text(position = 'dodge',
            fontface = 'bold',
            size = 8,
            vjust = 1.3,
            na.rm = TRUE) +
  scale_fill_brewer(palette = 'Set1') +
  facet_wrap(~factor(instance, order_by_max_new),
             scales = 'free_y',
             ncol = 4) +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(x = 'Optimization Method',
       y = 'Average Shannon Entropy',
       title = 'Average Shannon Entropy vs. Optimization Method') +
  theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5,
                                  size = 24),
        axis.title = element_text(size = 18),
        axis.text = element_text(size = 14),
        strip.background = element_rect(fill = 'grey90'),
        strip.text = element_text(face = 'bold'),
        legend.direction = 'horizontal',
        legend.position = 'top',
        legend.text = element_text(size = 14),
        legend.title = element_text(size = 14))

ggsave('plots/average_shannon.png', width = 12, height = 14, units = 'in', bg = 'white')
```
